name: Table Solitaire Card
description:
Table Solitaire Card is a classic solitaire card game.
Download and play it now, it will bring you endless of fun.
How to play Solitaire?
- Tap or drag cards to the destination.
- Stack the cards in four different colors (hearts, squares, plum, spades) from small to large (A to K).
- Auto complete for solved Solitaire game.
